mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( maintitle, subtitle, date, hostid, detail, categoryno, file,enddate) VALUES ( #{maintitle}, #{subtitle}, #{date}, #{hostid},#{detail},#{categoryno},#{file},#{enddate})
mapper.select: SELECT no AS meetingno, maintitle, subtitle, date, hostid, detail, categoryno, file ,enddate, meetinglike, participants FROM meeting ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT no AS meetingno, maintitle, subtitle, date, hostid, detail, categoryno, file ,enddate, meetinglike, participants FROM meeting WHERE categoryno = #{categoryno} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM participation WHERE meetingno=#{meetingno}; DELETE FROM meeting WHERE no=#{meetingno};
